name: Landify - Landing Page UI Kit v2.0
description:
Landify V2.0 - is LIVE!

Create your landing page design faster with Landify UI kit. The kit contains 170+ blocks and 500+ components. It's fully customisable, well-organised layers, text, color and effect styles. It is crafted with a vision to support any web project thereby creating a block system that helps with all the use cases.


‚ú® Learn more at landify.design ‚ú®

‚ùì What's Next?

Now, Landify v2 is crafted for all three breakpoints ‚Äì desktop, tablet and mobile. The upcoming release will be with a few more blocks and a few new categories as well.
